I've played this game for a few years I've had it for a lot longer but I never really got into it. I now find myself playing it nearly everyday. The satisfaction of playing a comp game with friends and winning is amazing its always feels good winning a comp game no matter what. Of course you want to uninstall the game after losing a 1v1 at the end of a round but you just have to get over it and learn from your mistakes. I highly recommend getting prime so you can play and enjoy the game as without prime you might as well be playing COD: WAW on the 360 with the amount of hackers in non prime matchmaking, the CSGO anti cheat is also a complete joke so don't think a hacker will get banned mid match. I also recommend picking up some skins and getting into trading.
